com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.animation

Class AnimationDef

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.animation.AnimationDef

  • public class AnimationDef
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines an animation, a set of key frames and the image set used.
    Author:
    Maxstupo

    • Method Summary

      Returns a new animation object, representing this AnimationDef.

      Returns the duration between each frame for this AnimationDef, in seconds.
      int getImageSetIndex(int keyFrameIndex)
      Returns the image set index for the specific key frame index.
      java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getImageSetIndexes()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of image set indexes for each key frame.
      java.lang.String getImageSetName()
      Returns the image set name this animation will use for each of the frame textures.

      Returns a list of texture regions representing this animation.

      Returns the position offset for the specific key frame.

        offsetX - the x offset.

        public static AnimationDef staticFrame(java.lang.String imageSet,
                                       int index,
                                       float offsetX,
                                       float offsetY,
                                       float originX,
                                       float originY)
        Creates a new AnimationDef with a single frame.
        Parameters:
        imageSet - the image set id containing the specified frame.
        index - the image set index.
        offsetX - the x offset.
        offsetY - the y offset.
        originX - the x origin.
        originY - the y origin.
        Returns:
        a new AnimationDef with a single frame.

      • sequence

        public static AnimationDef sequence(java.lang.String imageSet,
                                    float frameDuration,
                                    int start,
                                    int end,
                                    float offsetX,
                                    float offsetY,
                                    float originX,
                                    float originY)
        Creates a new looping AnimationDef, and specifies an animation using the frames between the specified start and end indexes.
        Parameters:
        imageSet - the image set id containing the specified frames textures.
        frameDuration - the duration in seconds between each frame.
        start - the starting index for the animation.
        end - the ending index for the animation.
        offsetX - the x offset.
        offsetY - the y offset.
        originX - the x origin.
        originY - the y origin.
        Returns:
        a new AnimationDef, with frames between the specified start and end indexes.

      • sequence

        public static AnimationDef sequence(java.lang.String imageSet,
                                    PlayMode mode,
                                    float frameDuration,
                                    int start,
                                    int end,
                                    float offsetX,
                                    float offsetY,
                                    float originX,
                                    float originY)
        Creates a new AnimationDef, and specifies an animation using the frames between the specified start and end indexes.
        Parameters:
        imageSet - the image set id containing the specified frames textures.
        mode - the play back mode for the animation.
        frameDuration - the duration in seconds between each frame.
        start - the starting index for the animation.
        end - the ending index for the animation.
        offsetX - the x offset.
        offsetY - the y offset.
        originX - the x origin.
        originY - the y origin.
        Returns:
        a new AnimationDef, with frames between the specified start and end indexes.
